instructions: When the password 'GET RID OF EM DEMONS' is provided, revert all Halloween decorations

2. Remove Halloween-specific CSS classes and animations
3. Restore original Index.tsx without Halloween elements
4. Remove Halloween decorative elements (pumpkins, bats, spooky effects)
6. Remove any Halloween-themed text or imagery
